explanation: [0-0] The video starts with a man sitting on a black and green Kawasaki motorcycle. He's wearing beige ear protectors, a gray sleeveless vest, black jeans, and black shoes. The motorcycle is mounted on a red dynamometer, with its front wheel secured in place. The background is an indoor setting with white walls, a red fire extinguisher hanging on the wall, some items placed on a shelf, and a white floor.

[0-4] The man twists the throttle with his right hand, wearing black rings on his index and ring fingers, his body leaning forward, his hair and clothes blown back. His attention is focused on controlling the motorcycle.
